articles.description: When lyricist Don Black asked her about her main influences, he expected to hear some of the biggest names in the business. Instead, she said she took her inspiration from 'the blackbird and the thrush'.
articles.content: Known for her ethereal vocals, expressive dancing and poetic lyrics, the evergreen Kate Bush is being discovered by a new generation. It comes nearly half a century since she began writing chart hits… [+12692 chars]

articles.author: Robert Mann
articles.title: Emily Atack goes braless in black playsuit as she soaks up the sun on picnic... - The Sun
articles.content:
EMILY Atack looked nothing short of sensational as she soaked up the sun during a picnic on Saturday afternoon.
The actress seemed in high spirits as she took to Instagram to give her fans a glimpse… [+1834 chars]
